channel.title: Need help trying to add 1 vs 1 pking!

item.title: Need help trying to add 1 vs 1 pking!
item.dc:creator: @Bubbsy7 Bubbsy7
item.description:
@Bubbsy7 wrote:

Ok I found this tut, said to add this below process:

if (victim.AttackingOn > 0) { sendMessage("Player is already in combat"); }

I get an error saying (victim
^Isn’t a symbol

So the tut says add this if you get any errors about process:

client victim = (client) server.playerHandler.players[AttackingOn];

I don’t get any errors but when you try logging in your screen is black and is nulled out…HELP PLEASE!!!

Read full topic
item.source: Need help trying to add 1 vs 1 pking!
